name: Oh No
description:
Chillennium 2016

The Ohio State University

Game Title: Oh No

Team Members: John Luna, Sarah Lawler, Zach Winegardner, and Kevin Bruggeman

Instructions:

Download and open folder: "OhNo_Chillenium2016_Final_Fast"

Run: OhNo_Chillenium2016_Final_Fast" Application

Unity Window Popup: Check Windowed

Graphics: Fastest

Controls:

Move - "W"(Forward) "A"(Left) "S"(Back) "D"(Right)

Shoot - Left Click Mouse

Toss Flower - Right Click Mouse

Jump - Spacebar

Game Play:

Avoid having a mini meltdown!

Panic makes you FALL apart!

Avoid the bee!

Dodge obstacles!

Required Hardware: PC, Keyboard, and Mouse
